repositories.author: snail007
repositories.name: goproxy
repositories.description: Proxy is a high performance HTTP(S), websocket, TCP, UDP, Socks5 proxy server implemented by golang. Now, it supports chain-style proxies,nat forwarding in different lan,TCP/UDP port forwarding, SSH forwarding.Proxy是golang实现的高性能http,https,websocket,tcp,socks5代理服务器,支持内网穿透,链式代理,通讯加密,智能HTTP,SOCKS5代理,域名黑白名单,跨平台,KCP协议支持,集成外部API。
